title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Experiencing an unusual attraction possibly leaves you bewildered and confused. Perhaps youre pulled toward a colleague with whom a tryst seems out of the question. Or maybe there is a shift in your feelings toward a current or potential partner. Be patient with your heart about your desires. Sometimes, strong magnetism is just a message that you two have a connection and there is a cosmic lesson waiting to be learned. Your body is often the first to sense this personal chemistry but there might be more to the story than you think. Keep digging for the spiritual treasure in every person you encounter. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
